ValidationRule.description: Here are the requirements for an application have a status of accepted.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( TEXT(Application_Status__c) = "Accepted", From_Radius__c = FALSE, OR( ISBLANK(Credit_Authorised_Limit__c), ISBLANK(Credit_Decision_Comments__c), ISBLANK(TEXT(OBU_Device_Required__c)), TEXT(Credit_Decision__c) <> "Accepted" ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Application must have a Credit Authorised Limit and Credit Decision Comment to be marked as "Accepted". It must also include an OBU Device required answer.
